appDescription: A modular web application for software measurement and estimation using Function Point Analysis (FPA) and Goal-Question-Metric (GQM) methodologies.
demoDescription: Click above to explore the application with demo data
techStack: Built with Next.js, React, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS
heroSubtitle: Academic Research on Software Estimation & Measurement
heroDescription: An educational platform developed as part of academic research to demonstrate software estimation methodologies using Function Point Analysis (FPA) and comprehensive measurement planning through Goal-Question-Metric (GQM) approach.
featuresTitle: Research Features for Software Engineering Education
featuresDescription: Essential methodologies and tools for learning software estimation and measurement techniques.

fpaEstimation.title: Function Point Analysis
fpaEstimation.description: Educational implementation of IFPUG standard FPA methodology for learning software size estimation techniques and project planning fundamentals.

measurementPlans.title: GQM Measurement Plans
measurementPlans.description: Academic exploration of Goal-Question-Metric methodology for creating comprehensive measurement plans and understanding software metrics.

projectTracking.title: Estimation Tracking
projectTracking.description: Research tools for monitoring estimation accuracy, comparing methodologies, and generating academic reports for analysis.

organizationManagement.title: Team Management
organizationManagement.description: Educational simulation of organizational structures with role-based access for understanding software development team dynamics.

automation.title: Calculation Automation
automation.description: Automated calculation processes to demonstrate computational approaches to software metrics and estimation accuracy.

collaboration.title: Academic Collaboration
collaboration.description: Collaborative features designed for educational environments, enabling group work and peer learning in software engineering.

benefitsDescription: Educational benefits of using systematic approaches to software estimation and measurement in academic research.

accurateEstimation.title: Educational Precision
accurateEstimation.description: Learn industry-standard FPA methodology through hands-on practice and understand the importance of accurate project estimation.

timeEfficiency.title: Research Efficiency
timeEfficiency.description: Focus on learning core concepts by automating complex calculations and dedicating time to understanding methodologies.

dataInsights.title: Academic Analysis
dataInsights.description: Develop analytical skills through comprehensive data visualization and measurement analysis for research purposes.

teamCollaboration.title: Collaborative Learning
teamCollaboration.description: Enhance academic collaboration with shared measurement plans and group estimation exercises for better understanding.
